mapper.select: SELECT id, order_id AS orderId, reviewer_id AS reviewerId, reviewed_id AS reviewedId, rating, comment, created_at AS createdAt FROM biz_service_review WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND reviewer_id = #{reviewerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_service_review ( order_id, reviewer_id, reviewed_id, rating, comment, created_at ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{reviewerId}, #{reviewedId}, #{rating}, #{comment}, NOW() )
